title: Openbucks No Longer Accepting Giftcards From Burger King
body: If memory serves me well, burger king gift cards were allowed to be used in the Openbucks section of purchasing RP. Was this not added when they updated the client or is it gone completely?

replies.body: It really sucks for this case, but League no longer supports Openbucks from Burger King it seems. It does look like you should still be able to get help from the OpenBucks customer support to get your funds though! I went ahead and looked up that support to make it a bit easier for you: support@openbucks.com.
